author: sky.cactus
content: Engineers spend for more time reading code then typing it, and everyone has autocomplete editors now.

author: sky.cactus
content: And a long but complete word is easier to read than an abbreviated word (because he an brains are amazing pattern matchers).

author: sky.cactus
content: So in the end, all this abbreviation is sacrificing overall productivity.

author: sky.cactus
content: It is born from people optimizing the task in front of them (typing a word for the first time) over optimizing the overall effort over time.
